text: U [Alloh taolo] faristagone dorad, ki hamvora [ʙandai] Uro az pesoru va az pusti saras ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo hifz mekunand. Be gumon, Alloh taolo hol [va sarnavisti nakui] hec qavmero taƣjir namedihad, magar on ki onon on ciro, ki dar dilhojason dorand, digargun sozand [va murtakiʙi gunoh savand]. Va hangome ki Alloh taolo ʙaroi qavme [giriftori va] ʙadi ʙixohad, hec ciz moneas naxohad sud va onon cuz [Zoti poki] U hec korsoze nadorand
